mapper.update: update creator set account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar_url = #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, encrypted_password = #{encryptedPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creation_time = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, account, nickname, avatar_url, phone_number, email, encrypted_password, creation_time, update_time from creator where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, account, nickname, avatar_url, phone_number, email, encrypted_password, creation_time, update_time from creator
